name: Phong Nha Adventure Cycling
description:
Enjoy an impressive full day cultural experience on quality mountain bikes as you cycle through the beautiful landscape of the Phong Nha Area, with great service and attention to detail given by your guide.
Shi will take you off the beaten track in a flexible itinerary, so you can discover traditional village life mostly unchanged over the last few hundred years, and he will introduce you to local farmers, fishermen and entrepreneurs.

Those who have taken Shi's tour have called it “Local adventure tourism at it’s best!”, so if you are a bit caved out, feel like some fresh air and some light exercise, and would like to meet and see fascinating local people and learn of their culture, jump onto one of Shi’s bike tours!
